mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.channel_id AS "channelId.id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.username AS "username", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.name AS "name", a.status AS "status", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.remark1 AS "remark1", userInfo.nickname AS "user.nickname"

mapper.update: UPDATE zms_user_channel_favorite SET channel_id = #{channelId.id}, user_id = #{user.id}, username = #{username}, nickname = #{nickname}, name = #{name}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, remark1 = #{remark1} WHERE id = #{id}
